title: [Ta'Illistim, Rocky Trail]
description: The trail continues its ascent to the plateau above.  Large numbers of plants have found homes in the niches that spot the rocks along the trail.  A misstep here would result in a very rough roll down the mountain.

The trail continues its ascent into the darkness above.  Large numbers of plants have made homes in the niches that spot the rocks along the trail.  A misstep here would result in a rough tumble down the dark mountainside.
